title: How to Set and Achieve Savings Goals
excerpt: Create realistic savings goals and develop a plan to reach them.
editorial_summary: This guide helps readers set SMART (Specific, Measurable, Achievable, Relevant, Time-bound) savings goals and create actionable plans to achieve them. It covers short-term goals (emergency fund, vacation) and long-term goals (home down payment, retirement), provides goal-setting worksheets, and explains how to track progress and stay motivated.
